title: Jumping for Joy
creator_credit: Thames and Clyde Film Company, Educational Films of Scotland and Stanley Russell
brief_description: An introduction to trampolining. A semi-instructional film, it shows the growing popularity of the five basic landing positions, and shows suitable exercises for people of different ages. A section on the value of trampolining in rehabilitation work is also included.
creator_credit_for_label: Thames and Clyde Film Company, Educational Films of Scotland and Stanley Russell
